body:
Source: https://www.elections.org.za/content/Elections/Laws-and-Regulations-Electoral-Commission/\
\
Elections Laws and Regulations 

Please note: To open PDF files, you need the free Adobe Reader on your computer – please download it if you don’t already have it installed.



[Electoral Act 73 of 1998 as Amended ](https://www.elections.org.za/content/Documents/Laws-and-regulations/Elections/Electoral-Act-73-of-1998-as-Amended/)

Format: PDF    Size: 1.58 MB

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\__

[Govt Gazette 42289 Commencement of 2019 Electoral Laws Amendment Act ](https://www.elections.org.za/content/Documents/Laws-and-regulations/Elections/Govt-Gazette-42289-Commencement-of-2019-Electoral-Laws-Amendment-Act/)

Government Gazette 42289 notices include:

\- Proclamation of the commence of the Electoral Laws Amendment Act (1 of 2019)

\- Amendment to the Electoral Regulations 2004 

\- Amendment to the Voter Registration Regulations 1998 

\- Amendment to the Regulations Concerning the Submission of List of Candidates 2004 

\- Correction notice in respect of Notice 113 of 2019 (Election Timetable for the 2019 National and Provincial Elections)

Format: PDF    Size: 6.1 MB

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

[Govt Gazette 42176 Act 1 of Electoral Laws Amendment Act 2019 ](https://www.elections.org.za/content/Documents/Laws-and-regulations/Elections/Govt-Gazette-42176-Act-1-of-Electoral-Laws-Amendment-Act-2019/)

Format: PDF    Size: 196 KB

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

[Electoral Act 73 of 1998 including Regulations ](https://www.elections.org.za/content/Documents/Laws-and-regulations/Elections/Electoral-Act-73-of-1998-including-Regulations/)

Format: PDF    Size: 827 KB
title: SA Elections: Laws and Regulations
